definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body

sentences.english: Where had all these ghosts come from?
sentences.chinese: 那么多的鬼魂都是从哪来的？

sentences.english: And because of his sinful life, Jada attained the body of a ghost.
sentences.chinese: 由于他罪恶的一生，加达得到了一个鬼魂的躯体。

sentences.english: How comes he does the monsters, I play the girlie ghosts?
sentences.chinese: 为什么怪物他来扮我就只能装这些女里女气的鬼魂？

sentences.english: I see unquiet ghosts and speak their whispered tongue.
sentences.chinese: 我看见动荡的鬼魂和他们低声的耳语。

sentences.english: The artistic technique of ghost revenge is adopted to express the author's ideal to the world.
sentences.chinese: 鬼魂复仇的艺术手法表现了作者的治世理想。

sentences.english: Our people had not seen white men before. We thought they were sprites.
sentences.chinese: 我辈族人之前从未见过白人，还误以为他们是鬼魂。

sentences.english: It is quite difficult for skeptics to refute the existence of ghosts simply because of ghosts' nature.
sentences.chinese: 因鬼魂的特性所致，质疑者很难驳倒鬼魂存在论。

sentences.english: It is quite difficult for skeptics to refute the existence of ghosts simply because of ghosts' nature.
sentences.chinese: 因鬼魂的特性所致，质疑者很难驳倒鬼魂存在论。

sentences.english: And I am told that it is haunted by the Ghost of Might-have-Been.
sentences.chinese: 我听说这栋房子里游荡着一个叫做“没准”的鬼魂。

sentences.english: Then the wailing and the touch of the ghosts would pass on and his horse would move again.
sentences.chinese: 随后哭声消失了，鬼魂也走开了，马又继续向前走。

sentences.english: That night, Scrooge is visited by three ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，有三个鬼魂造访了斯克鲁奇。

sentences.english: One night Du's spirit appears to him.
sentences.chinese: 一夜，杜丽娘的鬼魂显身于他。

sentences.english: Ghosts will simply levitate over the water.
sentences.chinese: 鬼魂只是悬浮在水面上方。

sentences.english: Giants in massive oared longships came out of the mist like ghosts!
sentences.chinese: 大量的巨人划着长船，像鬼魂一般从雾中显现。

sentences.english: And their ghosts may be heard as you march by the billabong.
sentences.chinese: 当你大步走过那潭死水，或许你会听到他们的鬼魂。

sentences.english: Starscream's ghost awakens and heads to Tryptic.
sentences.chinese: 红蜘蛛之鬼魂苏醒，只身前往铁甲星。

definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
